text: Chang yengbasing lakpagi maramdi nakhoigi thajaba adu tasengbani haiba utnanabani. Mangba yaba sana phaoba meida chang yeng-i; sanadagi mamal yamna hellaba nakhoigi thajaba adu khangnanaba chang yengba tabani. Madu oirabadi Jisu Christtabu phongdokpa Numit aduda thagatpa, matik mangal amasung ikai khumnaba nakhoina phangjagani.
